name: Threshold (itch) (FaerieFire)
description:
THRESHOLD A game about meeting the ghost of my past. 
A game about being trans. 
A game about the pier I often visit. Use SHIFT and CONTROL to play. Press f11 to go full screen in browser.

This game was made for a university project. However it quickly became something I poured my heart and soul into. This is my most personal game yet.

All my love
- Jade Fae
